languages.text: [Улыбнуться Инцендии] "Мы, Вольные Торговцы, должны выступать против зла плечом к плечу. Даже если кто-то пытается нас этим плечом отпихнуть".
[Smile at Incendia] "We Rogue Traders should stand against evil together, shoulder to shoulder. Even if someone is trying to shoulder us out of the way."
languages.original_text: [Улыбнуться Инцендии] "Мы, Вольные Торговцы, должны выступать против зла плечом к плечу. Даже если кто-то пытается нас этим плечом отпихнуть".

traits.locale_text: [Smile at Incendia] "We Rogue Traders should stand against evil together, shoulder to shoulder. Even if someone is trying to shoulder us out of the way."
[Smile at Incendia] "We Rogue Traders should stand against evil together, shoulder to shoulder. Even if someone is trying to shoulder us out of the way."
[Smile at Incendia] "We Rogue Traders should stand against evil together, shoulder to shoulder. Even if someone is trying to shoulder us out of the way."
[Smile at Incendia] "We Rogue Traders should stand against evil together, shoulder to shoulder. Even if someone is trying to shoulder us out of the way."

languages.text: [インセンディアに向かって微笑む]「我々自由開拓者は、連帯して共に邪悪に立ち向かうべきだ。例え誰かが我らをのけ者にしようとしていてもな」
languages.original_text: [Smile at Incendia] "We Rogue Traders should stand against evil together, shoulder to shoulder. Even if someone is trying to shoulder us out of the way."

traits.locale_text: [インセンディアに向かって微笑む]「我々自由開拓者は、連帯して共に邪悪に立ち向かうべきだ。例え誰かが我らをのけ者にしようとしていてもな」

languages.text: [对因森蒂娅微微一笑]“身为行商浪人，我们应当团结一致，对抗邪恶，哪怕有人打算从中作梗。”
languages.original_text: [Smile at Incendia] "We Rogue Traders should stand against evil together, shoulder to shoulder. Even if someone is trying to shoulder us out of the way."

traits.locale_text: [对因森蒂娅微微一笑]“身为行商浪人，我们应当团结一致，对抗邪恶，哪怕有人打算从中作梗。”

languages.text: [Sonreír a Incendia] «Los Comerciantes Independientes debemos unirnos para hacer frente al mal. Aunque alguien intente quitarnos de en medio».
languages.original_text: [Smile at Incendia] "We Rogue Traders should stand against evil together, shoulder to shoulder. Even if someone is trying to shoulder us out of the way."

traits.locale_text: [Sonreír a Incendia] «Los Comerciantes Independientes debemos unirnos para hacer frente al mal. Aunque alguien intente quitarnos de en medio».

languages.text: [Sourire à Incendia] « Les libres-marchands devraient opposer un front uni contre le mal. Et ce, même si quelqu'un fait tout son possible pour nous diviser. »
languages.original_text: [Smile at Incendia] "We Rogue Traders should stand against evil together, shoulder to shoulder. Even if someone is trying to shoulder us out of the way."

traits.locale_text: [Sourire à Incendia] « Les libres-marchands devraient opposer un front uni contre le mal. Et ce, même si quelqu'un fait tout son possible pour nous diviser. »

languages.text: [Incendia anlächeln] "Wir Freihändler sollten gemeinsam gegen das Böse stehen, Schulter an Schulter. Auch wenn jemand uns mit seiner Schulter aus dem Weg räumen will."
languages.original_text: [Smile at Incendia] "We Rogue Traders should stand against evil together, shoulder to shoulder. Even if someone is trying to shoulder us out of the way."

traits.locale_text: [Incendia anlächeln] "Wir Freihändler sollten gemeinsam gegen das Böse stehen, Schulter an Schulter. Auch wenn jemand uns mit seiner Schulter aus dem Weg räumen will."

languages.text: [İncendia'ya gülümse] "Biz Hür Tacirler, kötülüğe karşı omuz omuza durmalıyız. Bizi yoldan çıkarmaya çalışsalar dahi..."
languages.original_text: [Smile at Incendia] "We Rogue Traders should stand against evil together, shoulder to shoulder. Even if someone is trying to shoulder us out of the way."

traits.locale_text: [İncendia'ya gülümse] "Biz Hür Tacirler kötülüğe karşı omuz omuza durmalıyız. Bizi yoldan çıkarmaya çalışanlara karşı dahi..."
